title: Preparing Figures for Publication in Microscopy Today
content:
Abstract
Microscopic and macroscopic images, photographs, and computer-generated graphics are important components of the content published in Microscopy Today. Each type of graphic requires careful attention to its content and composition, that is, how well the image illustrates the facts being described, and its dimensions, resolution, and color balance. This paper is a brief guide to preparing acceptable content for print and digital publication.
